overview: Stuart Schulzke has deep world affairs content credentials. He earned two graduate degrees at the University of Oxford and his research has ranged from conflict resolution in Palestine to anti-corruption strategies in post-communist Central and Eastern Europe. Stuart previously worked for the United States House of Representatives, primarily in framing media strategies for the Congressional Human Rights Caucus. He oversees the development of FORA.tv partnerships with content providers and plays a primary role in formulating the company’s overall content strategy.
